item.title: Amulet Help
item.dc:creator: @Find Find
item.description:
@Find wrote:

Go into your server source and open item.java up and put the id of the item in the right field

small example

public static int body[] = {577,2896,2906,2916,your item id here,2926,2936,2520, 638 , 640,642, 430, 10300, 11154, 11471,

i hope it helps

item.title: Amulet Help
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

I make my first model, a Dark Plate, and whenever i try to make it go in the amulet slot, it goes in the weapon slot, can someone help?

Heres the code i used
(Pics at bottom

if(i == 13888) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 12056; //Model invent/drop id class8.anInt181 = 1000; //Model zoom (decrease to zoom in) class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 12056; //Model wield id (male) class8.anInt200 = 12056; //Model wield id (female) class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dark Member Plate"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Member PlateBody".getBytes(); }
